name: Ghost Town
storyline:
This is a story set in the ghost town outside the city, about a guy who hates people and a girl who helps ghosts called "Phantoms" who are unable to move on due to their attachment to this world.
But there's a connection between the "phantoms" and the girl, which later leads to sudden twists.
What is their secret?
summary:
This story game brings a unique and fun twist to choose your own story adventures. you'll love making choices in this interactive story game!
One choice can change everything!
Immerse yourself in a mysterious story where you make the choices and decide the ultimate fate of other people!
